text: Chris Roosevelt Jones (born 23 October 1991) is Liberian international footballer who plays for German club 1. FC Bruchsal, as a midfielder. == Career == Jones has played club football in Germany for ASV Durlach, Karlsruher SC II, FC Nöttingen and SVN Zweibrücken. He made his international debut for Liberia in 2014. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Liberian footballers Category:Liberia international footballers Category:ASV Durlach players Category:Karlsruher SC II players Category:FC Nöttingen players Category:SVN Zweibrücken players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Liberian expatriate footballers Category:Liberian expatriate sportspeople in Germany Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany
title: Chris Roosevelt Jones
